1.0.0.name: wordpress/gc-message-box
1.0.0.description:
This light plugin gets you more conversion by placing a nice looking message box displaying your main message and/or Call To Action inside your articles and blog posts. It highlights your main message in a smart way and therefore grabs your visitors' attention.

Features

  • Action URL
  • Message Text
  • Action Button Text
  • Message and Action Button layouts
  • Appear on list screens like home, category pages, search results etc.
  • Appear on article pages between the article and the comments
  • Can appear repeatedly
  • Predefined color schemes

Design settings

  • Custom Background Color
  • Custom Message Text Color
  • Custom Action Button Color
  • Custom Action Button Hover Color
  • Custom Action Button Text Color
  • Custom Border Radius
  • Text Shadows

Links

  • Demo: GC Message Box i
